Co-Founder - Generative AI Company

Mountain View, California, United States

Full Time Mid-level / Intermediate USD 52K - 123K *
  • Website
  • LinkedIn
  • Search

Pixona

Discover top job opportunities, connect with mentors, and access AI-powered tools designed to help you grow and succeed in your career.

View all jobs at Pixona

Apply now Apply later

Posted 5 days ago

Overview:

The future is now! www.pixonahealth.com is a community to help workers in healthcare and adjacent professions discover top job opportunities, connect with mentors in a genuine community, and access AI-powered tools designed to grow and succeed in their career over their entire lives. Our co-founders have 8+ years at Google and experience working in healthcare and are passionate about connecting people with opportunity on a massive scale. As we build, our small but mighty team is looking for a software engineer who is passionate about helping others, skilled in software development, and who loves to build so can grow well and help make us into the next multi-billion dollar company.Â 

Role Description:

In this role you Will Build Both Consumer-facing And Enterprise-grade software. Your key tasks will include designing and testing new generative AI technologies, scaling the product, and driving the development and implementation of the latest technologies into the Pixona platform. This role offers the opportunity to work on cutting-edge AI technologies and make a significant impact in the field of healthcare, recruiting and career development.

Requirements

Qualifications:

  • Strong proficiency in programming languages such as Python, Java, or Typescript
  • Strong frontend engineering skills
  • Experience with system design and architecture
  • Experience with generative AI technologies and frameworks
  • Knowledge of machine learning algorithms and techniques
  • Experience with deep learning models and frameworks
  • Strong problem-solving and analytical skills
  • Excellent communication and teamwork abilities
  • Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field
  • Experience in the recruitment industry or HR technology is a plus

Benefits

Important:

  • This role is equity-only until we seek and obtain funding. We expect this to last 2-4 months.

Apply now Apply later
